name: SimpleLineChart
summary: Simple line charts for iOS ðŸ“ˆ
description: SimpleLineChart is a simple, lightweight line chart library for iOS. It provides an easy-to-use interface to create customizable line charts with a few lines of code. The library supports customizable styles. It's a great option for developers who need to quickly add line charts to their iOS apps without the overhead of a larger, more complex charting library.
